text: Imana rakhanare loka tara teca aheta je allahavara ani tyacya paigambaravara imana rakhatata, ani jevha asa samasyeta, lokanni ekatra honyaci avasyakata asate paigambaransobata asatata, tevha joparyanta tumacyakaduna anumati gheta nahita, kothehi jata nahita. Je loka (asa prasangi) tumacyakaduna anumati ghetata, vastivaka te heca loka hota, jyanni allahavara ani tyacya paigambaravara imana rakhalele ahe. Tevha ase loka jevha tumacyakaduna apalya ekhadya kamakarita anumati (paravanagi) magatila tevha tumhi tyancyapaiki jyala icchita asala anumati dya ani tyancyasathi allahajavala maphici prarthana kara. Nihsansaya, allaha mapha karanara, daya krpa karanara ahe
